reviewText:
Fine collection of these old films....A fine review of the Stewart works any fan should review these classic pieces.
Of course the Eastwood movie is also a Western classic can be seen again and again.

This is very nice collection of Universal Westerns from 30s to 70s. There are three DVDs and are like the ones if you buy the movies by themselves. "High Plains Drifter" is in color, Widescreen and runs for about 1hr and 46mins; "Destry Rides Again" is in b&w, full-frame and runs for about 1hr and 35mins; "Winchester '73" is in b&w, full-frame and runs for about 1hr and 33mins.

This collection provides English and French (only for High Plains Drifter)audio and English, Spanish and French subtitles. The quality of the movies are great and are the same as buying the movies separately. These movies star James Stewart, Clint Eastwood, Marlene Dietrich, Biran Donlevy, Dan Duryea, Shelley Winters, plus others.

Overall this is a great collection and I would recommend this if you don't already have any of these films.
Nice collection.
Very Pleased. Fast shipment.  Just as advertised
Purchased this Box set primarily for Destry Rides Again. Picture quality is excellent.

Great value - quality top notch.
Well packed and very prompt delivery.
Recommended.
I bought this as a gift for the Winchester 73 movie. The other movies were not important but welcomed as an extra bonus.
Can't reviews this movie set as it was returned as being damaged.
All three are good, western entertainment.
3 Great movies!  All worked fine and were a great value!
three of the best westerns

The main reason for purchasing this DVD was because it included "Destry Rides Again". However, this collection of three great westerns for the price of one made it an easy decision. I rated this set of westerns with five stars! You can't go wrong!
exactly as expected

Gave this as a gift to my dad! He loves western movies and I really was only looking for High Plains Drifter...but I came across this one at a lower price and I got 2 extra movies so I couldn't pass it up! If you love western then this DVD is the one for you!!
This James Stewart doing good stories. Eastwood is pathetic thinking of throwing it away.

Winchester 73 and Destry Rides Again are enhanced for 16:9 - High Plains Drifter is apparently taken from the first non-anamorphic DVD release; it is not enhanced for 16:9. The price reflects this but it would be nice if it said so in the product description.
Great

A nice collection of great western movies.  But beware - this DVD is NOT enhanced for wide-screen TV's.  Although High Plains Drifter is in its OAR, it will appear half size on an HDTV.  Otherwise a good bargain.
So good!
Western classics at a great price. What is not to like?
gift for my husband as he had old vcr with this on so got him new dvd of it and got rid the old vcr tape
The great movie for one very low price every one of them is a classic  a movie buff will enjoy watching them over and over
